author: Reuters Editorial
title: ATON raises stake in South African target Murray & Roberts to 40 percent
text:
JOHANNESBURG (Reuters) - German investment house ATON has raised its stake in South African builder Murray & Roberts ( MURJ.J ) to nearly 40 percent, it said on Tuesday.
ATON, which already held about a third of the stock, is in the middle of a $400 million takeover bid for the rest of Murray & Roberts.
The bid has been rejected by Murray and Roberts, which itself has started all-share merger talks with rival Aveng ( AEGJ.J ).
Reporting by Tiisetso Motsoeneng; editing by Jason Neely
